title: Group portrait of two men, including groom, wearing moustache, dark necktie, and light colored carnation on left lapel, standing with two women, including bride, wearing mid length veil, necklace, light colored short sleeve wedding dress with floral lace overlay and bow below bust line, and light colored short gloves, holding bouquet, posed in front of marble fireplace in interior with wallpaper and television, possibly on Tioga Street in Homewood
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
